headline: Harris Won Enough Votes to Be the Democratic Nominee
description: Vice President Kamala Harris secured enough delegates to clinch the Democratic Party’s nomination for president, becoming the first Black woman and person of South Asian heritage to earn the top spot on a major party’s ticket.
newsletter_headline: Harris Won Enough Votes to Be the Democratic Nominee
newsletter_sub_hed: Also, the Middle East is on edge as Israel braces for retaliation. Here’s the latest at the end of Friday.

headline: The Middle East is on edge as Israel braces for retaliation
description: Iran and its proxies in Gaza and Lebanon have vowed to attack Israel to avenge senior leaders of Hamas and Hezbollah who were assassinated this week, threatening to escalate tensions and derail truce talks.
